James YeoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 15 Aug 2018Used to use Stocks Cafe but switch to InvestingNote.You can compare portfolio against STI Index in a clearcut and with beautiful diagrams. Can see all the stock-related news too.0 comments0
